casebody.data:
CALIFORNIA SCHOOL BOARDS ASSOCIATION
v.
STATE of California S247266 Supreme Court of California APRIL 18, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

Petition for review granted. The request for judicial notice filed on April 11, 2018, is granted. The petition for review is granted.
